snippet: Jane Wellman, a college-cost oracle, talks about tuition, salaries and college vs. prison.
abstract: Jane Wellman, whose Delta Project on Postsecondary Education Costs, Productivity and Accountabilty, has produced some of the best-regarded data on the issue of college costs, answers questions about where a college student's money should go.
lead_paragraph: Jane Wellman, a college-cost oracle, talks about tuition, salaries and college vs. prison.

keywords.value: Delta Project on Postsecondary Education Costs, Productivity and Accountability
keywords.name: organizations
